attributes.title: This app needs to be deleted before it ruins more lives then it already has
attributes.review: This app is a disgrace to humankind. After downloading this app weird things started happening to me. I felt like I was being watched all the time. It felt almost like a cult being apart of this. Please remove it Apple I beg you. It’s not safe .

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: downloaded this to be updated and within a week all my apps were slowing down, crashing and even my phone. got sent a bunch of horrible offensive emails. do not recommend getting, please remove this app from the app store. app gave me MULTIPLE virus ! unacceptable ! please remove ✨❤️

attributes.title: This app owes me stars at this point
attributes.review: -5 Stars if possible. Absolute worse, difficult to load and when it finally does it’s impossible to navigate the thing. No new updates. The crap that is posted on this thing are just lies. Orange and his app are the most sorry things I’ve seen.

attributes.title: WORST EXPERIENCE
attributes.review: I simply wanted to download this app to support and learn about what the 🙈 big cheeto 🙈 has planned. I was very disappointed when it took 4 days to download. Not only that, but when I went on to the app, everything was very messy and disorganized. I did not enjoy my experience and will be deleting the app. Vote him out. #tiktok

attributes.title: Roaches and brainwashing
attributes.review: Ugh this app is so bad I literally downloaded it for like 3 seconds and I started to see my vision become blurry then I heard someone say “be racist and support me” and I was like omg who else would say this then I remembered omg Donald trump said that he is trying to brain wash me and this app also had like roaches all over it like ewwwww 🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: I’ve received better news from a toddler
attributes.review: This should absolutely now be rated #1 in news. It’s freaking absurd. The only first place position it has earned is number one in fake news or number one in absolute bullish¡t. A newborn could give you a more accurate news report.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I had downloaded the apps with high hopes of learning what our 🍊 president has done for our country, but after days of waiting for it to downloaded I was met with the disgusting reality.  Trump actually is a rapist and racist and homophobic and transphobic and sexist and pathological liar and terrible human being.  Sorry but I know who I will not be voting for 2020.

attributes.title: I would give it ZERO stars if I could!!!
attributes.review: This app sucked! It took forever to download and when it finally it wouldn’t open. The app actually made my phone crash!! I redownloaded the app and it FINALLY opened. Only to get pop up porn ads! I thought I’d was suppose to be a family friendly app!!! 👎👎👎

attributes.title: Requires phone number
attributes.review: Don’t like that I have to give my phone number to use the app. Wanted to go on and support this great, great, great man child. But I couldn’t without giving up my data! China might use my phone number to hack me! I can’t trust that. Very disappointed that I couldn’t even view the Great App. Sad!

attributes.title: One of the worst and ugliest things I have ever seen
attributes.review: This app is just a disgrace to be up. This app gives out so much false news and sends a lot of spam texts that are just stupid and useless to my phone, not only that it crashes everything on my phone with that disgusting logo. Do not get this app!!
